# shouldBufferInAnticipationOfPlayback

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the player starts buffering in anticipation of a request to begin playback.

## Declaration

```swift
var shouldBufferInAnticipationOfPlayback: Bool { get }
```

## Accessing command details

- **anticipatedPlaybackRate**: The rate at which the coordinator expects playback to resume.
- **itemTime**: The time to seek to in the item timeline.
- **completionDueDate**: The deadline by which the coordinator expects the delegate to handle the command.
